Asian Premieres of Berlinale 2018 Winners at HKIFF42

æ­å–œï¼ç¬¬68å±†æŸæ—å½±å±•å‰›åœ“æ»¿é–‰å¹•ï¼Œå¤šéƒ¨ç²çä½³ä½œå°‡æ–¼HKIFF42ä½œäºæ´²é¦–æ˜ ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬è©•å¯©åœ˜å¤§çå¾—ä¸»ã€Šå‡é¢äººé–“ã€‹ï¼›æ¦®ç²å‚‘å‡ºè—è¡“æˆå°±ççš„ã€Šå¤§æ–‡è±ªçš„åš´å†¬ã€‹ï¼›åœ‹éš›å½±è©•äººè¯ç›Ÿççš„ã€Šæ²³ç•”çš„æƒ¡æ„ã€‹åŠã€Šå¤§è±¡å¸­åœ°è€Œåã€‹ï¼›å¤©ä¸»æ•™äººé“ç²¾ç¥çä¸‰å€‹å–®å…ƒçš„å¾—çä½œã€Šè¶…å¸‚æƒ…ç·£ã€‹ã€ã€Šæ€’æµ·ä»å¿ƒã€‹åŠã€Šéå¸¸æˆ°çˆ­åŠ‡å ´å…­é¢é«”ã€‹ã€‚

å…¶ä»–é¸æ˜ çš„å¾—çä½œå“é‚„æœ‰ï¼šã€Šé€šéˆæœˆèˆã€‹ç²æ–°ä¸–ä»£å–®å…ƒï¼ˆé’å°‘å¹´çµ„ï¼‰å¤§çï¼›ã€Šç‹¼éš±ä¹‹å®¶ã€‹ç²å¡é‡ŒåŠ åˆ©çï¼›ã€Šé›£æ°‘é»ƒé‡‘åœ‹ã€‹ç²åœ‹éš›ç‰¹èµ¦çµ„ç¹”é›»å½±çï¼›ä»¥åŠå‹•ç•«ã€Šå¤ªé™½ç³»æ¼«éŠã€‹ç²å¥§è¿ªçŸ­ç‰‡çã€‚

Congratulations to all the award winners of the Berlin International Film Festival 2018! HKIFF fans will have the privilege to watch the Asian premieres of these award-winning films, including MUG, winner of the Grand Jury Prize; DOVLATOV, winner of Outstanding Artistic Contribution Award; winners of FIPRESCI Prizes, RIVER’S EDGE and AN ELEPHANT SITTING STILL; and winners of the Ecumenical Prizes, IN THE AISLES, STYX, and THEATRE OF WAR.

Other awarded films include THE SEEN AND UNSEEN, winner of the Grand Prix in the Generation KPlus section; THE WOLF HOUSE, winner of the Caligari Film Prize; ELDORADO, winner of the Amnesty International Film Prize, and SOLAR WALK, winner of the Audi Short Film Award.

å…¶ä»–é¸æ˜ çš„å¾—çä½œå“é‚„æœ‰ï¼šã€Šé€šéˆæœˆèˆã€‹ç²æ–°ä¸–ä»£å–®å…ƒï¼ˆé’å°‘å¹´çµ„ï¼‰å¤§çï¼›ã€Šç‹¼éš±ä¹‹å®¶ã€‹ç²å¡é‡ŒåŠ åˆ©çï¼›ã€Šé›£æ°‘é»ƒé‡‘åœ‹ã€‹ç²åœ‹éš›ç‰¹èµ¦çµ„ç¹”é›»å½±çï¼›ä»¥åŠå‹•ç•«ã€Šå¤ªé™½ç³»æ¼«éŠã€‹ç²å¥§è¿ªçŸ­ç‰‡çã€‚

Congratulations to all the award winners of the Berlin International Film Festival 2018! HKIFF fans will have the privilege to watch the Asian premieres of these award-winning films, including MUG, winner of the Grand Jury Prize; DOVLATOV, winner of Outstanding Artistic Contribution Award; winners of FIPRESCI Prizes, RIVER’S EDGE and AN ELEPHANT SITTING STILL; and winners of the Ecumenical Prizes, IN THE AISLES, STYX, and THEATRE OF WAR.

Other awarded films include THE SEEN AND UNSEEN, winner of the Grand Prix in the Generation KPlus section; THE WOLF HOUSE, winner of the Caligari Film Prize; ELDORADO, winner of the Amnesty International Film Prize, and SOLAR WALK, winner of the Audi Short Film Award.
